name: Doyobi Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of digital literacy classes intended to transform kids into self-motivated learners who are curious, inventive, and resourceful. The company provides a wide range of coding classes for kids and different curricula for different ages, enabling students to learn coding.
one_liner: Operator of digital literacy classes intended to transform kids into self-motivated learners who are curious, inventive, and resourceful. The company provides a wide range of coding classes for kids and different curricula for different ages, enabling students to learn coding.
